title: Rarotonga: Moana Sands Lagoon Resort
inclusions_evidence: “Add on your best available airfares to these land only deals.”; “Includes 5 nights at Moana Sands Lagoon Resort - Return airport transfers -Tropical breakfast daily - Complimentary use of kayak equipment, reef shoes, beach towels & sun loungers”; “Bonus Includes 1 FREE night^”

hotel.name_or_hint: Moana Sands Lagoon Resort (Deluxe Lagoon Studio)

items.label: Use of kayak equipment, reef shoes, beach towels & sun loungers

other.notes: No external hotel or flight pricing sources were provided. Unable to fetch live competitor rates (booking.com, Expedia, suppliers) within constraints, so item prices are null.

reasoning: Land-only package at 2056 for two (1028 pp) includes return transfers, daily breakfast, equipment use and a free night — good inclusions and a room cost of 411.2 per night for the room. Flights are explicitly not included. I could not reliably obtain independent DIY hotel+transfer+flight pricing because no external competitor URLs or live rate fetching are available under the instructions, so DIY totals are null; rating reflects perceived value given inclusions and the free night.
additional_notes: Travel dates shown on the deal page span 9 Nov 25 - 31 Mar 26. The deal is adult-only (18+) per the page. All cited text is from the provided deal page.
